EmailTemplate.description: MTO Order or Quote Initial Response
EmailTemplate.name: MTO Initial Follow Up
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} : {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We are working on your quote!
Case Number:
Please Note: You have requested special order part(s) that could take up to 2 weeks to research and quote.
If you have any questions, please reply to this email.
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
